data.message: Could someone help me change my name? I was trying to update my employer page and accidentally changed my personal name instead. Help! I don't want this name for 60 days

replies.message: Hi there. Thanks for reaching out. Unfortunately, once you have changed your name you must wait 60 days before you can change it again. -Elizabeth

Facebook, you guys wrongly disabled my account and I cant login or anything. Please message me back already. I'm not fake lol. I have hundreds of photos of me and my pets and boyfriend. Youve done this before out of the blue and i got it back. respond already, it's been like 9 days.
I am not happy with a 60 day wait.  I'm really thinking I should just close my account.  Poor customer service.  Now my name is where I work.  Totally stupid.
Marshall, you dont speak for facebook. They have to do something eventually, I can try my luck as much as I desire.
That's a lie I can change my name several times during the 60-day, very bad customer service! 🌚

Gramercy Park Rochester ask your friends to report your Facebook as using a different name/fake name. 
Facebook will then get you to verify with your photo ID. 
Your name will be changed to match your photo ID.
